game.name: Batman™: Arkham Knight - GCPD Lockdown
game.categories: Single-player, Downloadable Content, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Steam Trading Cards, Steam Cloud, Steam Leaderboards, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: 아캄 나이트 사건 이후가 배경인 스릴 넘치는 이야기 팩에서 나이트윙이 되어 고담시 경찰서를 탈출하려는 펭권을 막으세요.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Set after the events of Arkham Knight, play as Nightwing to stop the Penguin from breaking out of the Gotham City Police Department in this thrilling story pack.
